Welcome to Pakari, a nice option for travelers like you.Close to some of Ambato's most popular landmarks, such as Cuernos de la Abundancia (1.5 mi) and Iglesia Barrio Solis (1.5 mi), Pakari is a great destination for tourists.During your stay, take advantage of some of the amenities offered, including a 24 hour front desk, room service, and baggage storage, and you can go online as Pakari offers guests free wifi. Guests are also welcome to enjoy an on-site restaurant. For travelers arriving by car, free parking is available.While in Ambato be sure to experience nearby French restaurants such as Creme Brulee Chocolaterie or Crêpe & Company - Ambato.If you are interested in exploring Ambato, check out one of the parks, such as Jardin Botanico Atocha-La Liria and Juan Benigno Vela Park.Pakari looks forward to welcoming you on your visit to Ambato.

comentarios.comentario: Un ostello dovrebbe avere una sala in comune più confortevole e invitante, in Ambato fa un pochino di freddo e c'è bisogno che la doccia funzioni l'acqua calda è indispensabile, ma invece abbiamo dovuto lavarci per parti perche non funzionava, il bagno aveva un brutto odore di acqua stagna e nessuna mensola dove appoggiare qualcosa. Abbiamo preso una camera tripla, due letti medi e uno piccolo, alla fine per il freddo abbiamo diviso un letto per usare doppia coperta. Appendi abiti inesistente, così come una presa per cargare il cellulare... Solo una in una postazione impossibile. Un armadio che lo toccavo e si muoveva tutto. Pulizia da fare e bene, è la cosa principale. Colazione era meglio non prenderla, una ciottolina di frutta... Per essere in Ecuador è un insulto, pane da tost bianco secco, pure questo intollerabile essendo ad Ambato, dove hanno un buon pane fresco, caffè senza latte, un uovo sodo super industriale e senza chiedere se lo volevamo cotto in altro modo.  Prezzo per la camera con booking 41 dollari... Direi che con queste accortezze da migliorare potrebbe valere questo prezzo... Altrimenti dovrebbero riguardare i prezzi.  Personale abbastanza cordiale, il proprietario simpatico e gentile. Per questo do 3 palline, altrimenti sarebbero state 2…

Excelente opción para hospedarse, ubicado al norte de la ciudad de Ambato, habitaciones cómodas, TV por cable, agua caliente, personal super atento, un ambiente super acogedor, precios económicos.....

Siamo arrivati qui dopo 16 ore di viaggio tra aerei e auto, distrutti, la camera piccola ma poco male, apparentemente pulita, ma di uno sporco imbarazzante, persino lo specchio del piccolo armadietto era tutto imbrattato, nn dico di lustrare i bastoni delle tende tutti i giorni ma l essenziale almeno lo pretendo, il copriletto aveva i bordi neri e sudici e schizzi che nn oso immaginare la natura, ho dormito con i miei vestiti addosso perché mi faceva senso il contatto della mia pelle con quelle lenzuola, tra le altre cose nn erano di cotone ma sintetiche , orribili, il letto praticamente senza doghe e quindi si è dormito malissimo... la Wi-Fi praticamente inesistente, si connetteva a corrente alternata, in bagno neppure una luce nello specchio, mio marito ha avuto difficoltà a fare la barba ... detto questo aggiungo  che il proprietario o chi ci ha accolto è stato super gentile e disponibile, questo devo riconoscerglielo... ma nn consiglio questo hotel  27 dic 2018…

direccion: Avenida Ruminahui Av Pichincha, Ambato 180150 Ecuador
descripcion: Set in Ambato, 47 km from Tarabita Cable Car, Hotel Golosone offers accommodation with a restaurant, free private parking and a garden.

comentarios.comentario: Reservé con ellos semanas antes al carnaval y tres días antes de la reserva me cancelan. Llamo a saber como me pueden ayudar a solucionar la cancelación y me encuentro con una persona poco profesional en manejar clientes. Es indignante que en un destino tan bueno como Ambato tienes que encontrarte con personal tan poco profesional y una falta de experticia en el manejo de reservas. Nada recomendable buscarlo en épocas ocupadas.

Viajé por trabajo a Ambato y encontré este hotel por Booking.com. Me encantó! Es muy nuevo súper limpio las camas son súper cómodas y la atención del lugar es excelente! Y el precio es muy conveniente totalmente recomendable. Volveré siempre que vaya a Ambato. Felicidades! 💯

direccion: Avenida 12 de Noviembre 01-70 y Abdon Calderon, Ambato 180150 Ecuador
descripcion: See why so many travelers make Sahra Inn Hotel their hotel of choice when visiting Ambato. Providing an ideal mix of value, comfort and convenience, it offers an array of amenities designed for travelers like you.During your stay, take advantage of some of the amenities offered, including a 24 hour front desk, room service, and newspaper, and you can go online as Sahra Inn Hotel offers guests free wifi. Guests are also welcome to enjoy an on-site restaurant. For travelers arriving by car, free parking is available.Close to some of Ambato's most popular landmarks, such as Casa y Mausoleo de Juan Montalvo (1.4 mi) and La Catedral de Ambato (1.4 mi), Sahra Inn Hotel is a great destination for tourists.While in Ambato, you may want to check out some of the restaurants that are a short walk away from Sahra Inn Hotel, including Ali's Parilladas & Pizzeria (1.0 mi), la Fornace (0.4 mi), and El Rey del Burrito Ambato (0.8 mi).During your visit, be sure to check out popular attractions like Jardin Botanico Atocha-La Liria (1.0 mi) and Juan Benigno Vela Park (1.0 mi), which are all within walking distance of the hotel.We’re sure you’ll enjoy your stay at Sahra Inn Hotel as you experience all of the things Ambato has to offer.

comentarios.comentario: We stayed 3 nights during Carnival this year. The room was clean, had a large window (some rooms don't have any), was in a good location for carnival and the people at the service desk are extremely helpful.  But the room was cramped, lacked furnature to open the luggage on, lacked any of the common room amenities, only provided one towel and the wifi was hit and miss.  For $55 a night ($90 during carnival) you can get a better Hotel.

direccion: Avenida 12 de Noviembre 01-27 y Av. El rey Redondel de Cumanda, Ambato 180150 Ecuador
descripcion: Welcome to Hotel Imperial, your Ambato “home away from home.” Hotel Imperial aims to make your visit as relaxing and enjoyable as possible, which is why so many guests continue to come back year after year.Nearby landmarks such as Cuernos de la Abundancia (1.4 mi) and Iglesia Barrio Solis (1.4 mi) make Hotel Imperial a great place to stay when visiting Ambato.The rooms offer a kitchenette, and getting online is possible, as free wifi is available, allowing you to rest and refresh with ease.In addition, as a valued Hotel Imperial guest, you can enjoy free breakfast that is available on-site. Guests arriving by vehicle have access to free parking.While you’re here, be sure to check out some of the cafes, including Creme Brulee Chocolaterie, Chocolatte, and El Espigal, all of which are a short distance from Hotel Imperial.Best of all, Hotel Imperial makes it easy to experience many great Ambato attractions like Jardin Botanico Atocha-La Liria (1.0 mi) and Juan Benigno Vela Park (1.0 mi), which are a short distance away.Hotel Imperial puts the best of Ambato at your fingertips, making your stay both relaxing and enjoyable.

comentarios.comentario: In our opinion, this hotel has all the pluses: Centrally located, clean, full service 24/7. Good breakfast and great staff both: at the counter and inside. They are very knowledgeable and able to point out the most touristic interesting places to visit in Ambato and, in case, of need, they are willing to help in every possible way, making you to feel in family.

De lo peor que he conocido en Ambato en los últimos 10 años. La recepción engaña porque tiene una buena decoración, después ya las habitaciones son terribles, no hay iluminación, ni una buena limpieza. El comedor para el desayuno fue otra experiencia desagradable. El precio es alto en relación al servicio desastroso que ofrecen. Imposible volver o recomendarlo.

I had to leave the hotel i paid for 2 nightsi stayed one night ...the hotel on the website appear to be nice but I was angry when I saw the room and the food ...how the hell can you rate that as a 4 star  it’s a joke I wouldn’t give a half star my bed was full of hair and the room was dusty etc etc etc

el hotel es muy excelente en sus servicios, lo que da buenas expectativas, al momento de hospedarse , esto conlleva a hacer los mejores comentarios y recomendaciones, su decoración e infraestructura es acorde a las necesidades del huésped, prestando un excelente servicio al cliente.

They accommodated a large group well. The beds were ok and the bathrooms were decently clean. There is common space to pass time. The breakfast was ok. It is in a good location for the center of the city and walking distance to main parks and the bus terminal.

Ho sostato per una notte con la famiglia.  Il prezzo è buono, le camere sono belle e pulite ma un po' piccoline, e cosa peggiore l'unica finestra si apriva sul corridoio. Ciò ne compromette l'areazione (ogni cosa odora di disinfettante) e anche il rumore perchè non lascia intimità. La colazione era più che onesta, in generale considerato il prezzo mi ha soddisfatto.

Hotel antiguo falta remodelar... Barato... Bien ubicado... Falta aseo... Bueno para una emergencia económica... Habitaciones mal distribuidas... Baños pequeños incómodos sin ventilación... No es recomendado para viajes de placer

First, let's see all the nice features this hotel offers: It is located in the center of the city, across from Montalvo park, and close to any neighborhood in the city. The front desk people is very courteous and will help you with anything you want. In fact, one of the guys helped me fix my luggage going beyond his duty to fix it. The rooms are ample and the bathrooms clean. Now let's see the sad feature: Breakfast at this hotel is dangerous. I drank a strawberry juice for breakfast. The juice had a funny taste, and it tasted as if this juice was already fermented. I proceeded to drink it anyways thinking it may be my perception only. After a few minutes, I started feeling sick with nausea, vomits, and diarrhea. I had these symptoms three days in a row. I ended up consulting a doctor who prescribed antibiotics since I had a stomach virus probably from the old juice the hotel kept it. This hotel needs to review the ingredients they use to make the food. Juices should not be kept more than a day even if they are refrigerated. This is unacceptable for a high end hotel in Ambato as this hotel claims to be. Other than that, the experience at this hotel is good.…

El hotel es limpio y tiene lo que se necesita para descansar. Es pequeño pero se nota que procuran dar un buen servicio. Las habitaciones son bastante ante reducidas pero no les falta nada.  Lo que me causo un poco de conflicto es que la única ventana que tienen las habitaciones es es al pasillo y me sentí algo inquieta. El desayuno es razonable y hay buena disposición de personal para atender.

Buen hotel la atención es buena, las habitaciones son confortables y limpias. Tiene parqueadero grande y está ubicado en un sector céntrico. Fui con un grupo de turistas y lamentablemente el restaurante no es muy grande sin embargo la atención es buena.

direccion: Panamericana Sur Km 12, Ambato 180205 Ecuador

comentarios.comentario: Las imágenes no muestran la realidad de las instalaciones. Las habitaciones no tienen mantenimiento, la humedad sale por las paredes el olor es insoportable. La ropa de cama es vieja, los baños descuidados con olor a orinas. Pedí reembolso porq fue imposible dormir en esas condiciones, sin embargo me indicaron que no está sujeto a reembolso. Es triste encontrarse con alojamientos como este. Entiendo que el problema de la pandemia debió golpear mucho al sector turístico, pero si las instalaciones no tienen buen mantenimiento, no deben ofertarse, no se puede jugar así con tiempo y comodidad de los turistas. Ante todo la limpieza!!! Seguramente los pocos usuarios no volverán... es la primera reseña mala que escribo y lamento hacerlo, pero es irresponsable ofertar servicios en estas condiciones. …

direccion: Avenida Indoamerica y Avenida Indoamerica y Queretaro Km1 1/2 Frente a Hino, Ambato 180150 Ecuador
descripcion: Hotel Dubai is an excellent choice for travelers visiting Ambato, offering a family-friendly environment alongside many helpful amenities designed to enhance your stay.Guest rooms offer a desk, and Hotel Dubai makes getting online easy as free wifi is available.You can also take advantage of some of the amenities offered by the small hotel, including a 24 hour front desk, room service, and newspaper. In addition, guests can enjoy a lounge during their visit. As an added convenience, there is free parking available to guests.Given the close proximity of popular landmarks, such as Cuernos de la Abundancia (1.9 mi) and Iglesia Barrio Solis (1.9 mi), guests of Hotel Dubai can easily experience some of Ambato's most well known attractions.Travelers looking for wine bars can head to Restaurante Manhattan Steak and Grill.There is no shortage of things to do in the area: explore popular parks such as Jardin Botanico Atocha-La Liria and Juan Benigno Vela Park.Enjoy your stay in Ambato!

comentarios.comentario: Pésima la atención, al parecer no importa la palabra que dan sino ganar dinero ya que nos ofrecieron determinado numero de habitaciones y al final nos dijeron que debemos acomodarnos como podamos ya que era más importante ganar dinero... al final nos colgaron el teléfono... dejan mal a la ciudad de Ambato
